languages.text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} проблему радикально, отдав приказ отстранить Вести от командования. И потребовал{mf||а} от провинившегося последний отчет.
The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} проблему радикально, отдав приказ отстранить Вести от командования. И потребовал{mf||а} от провинившегося последний отчет.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.
The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.
The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.
The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} tomó una decisión drástica para resolver el problema, despojando a Vesti del mando de su unidad y exigiéndole un último informe sobre su progreso.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} tomó una decisión drástica para resolver el problema, despojando a Vesti del mando de su unidad y exigiéndole un último informe sobre su progreso.

languages.text: 舰长大人采取激烈的手段来解决问题，剥夺了维斯提的指挥权，并要求他在离职前提交探索进度的最终报告。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人采取激烈的手段来解决问题，剥夺了维斯提的指挥权，并要求他在离职前提交探索进度的最终报告。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは問題を解決するために、思い切ってヴェスティから部隊の指揮権を剥奪し、進捗状況に関する最終報告を要求した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは問題を解決するために、思い切ってヴェスティから部隊の指揮権を剥奪し、進捗状況に関する最終報告を要求した。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain unternahm drastische Schritte zur Lösung des Problems, indem er Vesti seines Kommandos enthob und einen Abschlussbericht über seinen Fortschritt verlangte.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain unternahm drastische Schritte zur Lösung des Problems, indem er Vesti seines Kommandos enthob und einen Abschlussbericht über seinen Fortschritt verlangte.

languages.text: Optant pour une solution radicale, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} relava Vesti de ses fonctions de commandant, puis lui ordonna de faire un dernier rapport sur la progression de son unité.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: Optant pour une solution radicale, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} relava Vesti de ses fonctions de commandant, puis lui ordonna de faire un dernier rapport sur la progression de son unité.

languages.text: Sorunu çözmek için sert önlemlere başvuran Lord Kaptan, Vesti'nin yetkilerini elinden alarak birimin ilerlemesi hakkında son bir durum raporu vermesini talep etti.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain took drastic action to solve the problem, stripping Vesti of command of his unit and demanding a final report on its progress.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, bu sorunu çözmek için sert önlemler aldı. Vesti'nin yetkilerini elinden alarak birimin ilerlemesi hakkında son bir durum raporu vermesini talep etti.
